column1: The Pit Room////The brisket is the true star of the show. The tender
column3: melt-in-your-mouth deliciousness is lovingly wrapped in a delicious dry rub and the smoke ring was ridiculously large. Now
column4: dump some extra of the two BBQ sauces on this bad boy...and you have a recipe for disaster...for your taste buds...cause it will WRECK them.
